mapper.sql: id, name, create_time, update_time, create_user_id, is_deleted
mapper.select: select id, name from t_qms_tag where id = #{tagId} and is_deleted = 0
select id, name from t_qms_tag where name like concat('%', #{tagName}, '%') and is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into t_qms_tag (id, name, create_time, update_time, create_user_id, is_deleted, description_cn) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{descriptionCnHtml,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into t_qms_tag
id,
name,
create_time,
update_time,
create_user_id,
is_deleted,
description_cn,

mapper.update:
update t_qms_tag
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
description_cn = #{descriptionCnHtml,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_qms_tag set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, description_cn = #{descriptionCnHtml,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
